::Kup/Jhiaxus-Hevn::
   
  Kup: Alright, Nightlight. You try and not worry. We'll call if his situation changes.
   
  Hevn follows Nightlight.
   
  Kup turns his attention back to Elder and Windlord.
   
  Kup: There must be a way.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Windlord/Nightlight:

Windlord smiled and said "I was thinking the same..." and added with 
a serious tone" Exits a way to extract the Optimus's matrix without 
harm his spark?"

************

Nighlight weakly smiled, puppet henv's words had made her remember 
that she was mother too and she has a daughter to care of.

"you're right... I would like to be able to do more for him, perhap i 
just need to walk around a bit and I need to check Elita, I can show 
you where is the mess hall and where are some empty quarters, you 
also needs rest..."

Nightlight stood up and slowly move towards windlord, Lord Elder and 
Kup and said "I'll go to check Elita and rest, after show hevn, the 
mess hall and his quarters... please tell me if Rodimus awake..."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Lord Elder/Jhiaxus-Hevn::
> 
> Elder smirks as he has a thought protraing Windlord as 'Captain 
Obvious.'
> 
> Kup: That it is, lad. I do have an idea though. The Minions took 
the reformatted Maximal version of the Matrix from Rodimus. A version 
of the Matrix from our contemporary time. That's more then four 
million years in the future. The Autobot version of the Matrix from 
this time period is on the planet. If we find the Ark I'm sure we 
could jump start Rodimus', or would that be Hot Rod's, Matrix with 
Optimus Prime's.
> 
> Elder: Would that drain the Autobot matrix and change history?
> 
> Kup: I'm hopeing that the mystical properties of the Matrix arn't 
so linear.
> 
> Meanwhile Hevn had sat with Nightlight.
> 
> Hevn: In time Rodimus is going to be alright. You arn't helping 
yourself sitting here worrying. How about we go get a drink and calm 
down a bit? Besides I havn't seen the little one in a very long time.
>



                         

       
---------------------------------
Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile.  Try it now.
